mapper.select: select ec.id,ec.title,ec.price,ec.reduction_money,ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum, ec.cover,ec.buy_count AS buyCount,ec.view_count AS viewCount, ecd.description,et.id AS teacherId,et.`name` AS teacherName, et.intro,et.avatar,es1.id AS subjectOneId,es1.title AS subjectOneTitle,es2.id AS subjectTwoId,es2.title AS subjectTwoTitle from edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.subject_parent_id = es1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.subject_id = es2.id LEFT JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON ec.id = ecd.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id = et.id WHERE ec.id = #{id};
